LEXEME: lεʔiliŋ 'small red ant/ iliwei 'large black ant'
(pa'an) bah 'hit (drum)/ (bui) tag 'hit (long drum)/ (goon) bah 'hit (gong)'/ puah 'drum stick'
mudiŋ 'plant smth. like a tree that takes many years to grow
matiŋ paʔa ''one word'/ kadada 'chat'/ mapi kadada 'lets chat'
ʔεʔui/ nou 'palm sugar/ used for tuak and brooms'
todo 'rub/ as bathing'/ osong 'rub/ as oil into skin'
tεʔε 'to stab/ to plant/ to cut'
abang 'clean for yard'/ baak 'clear/ of grass'/ gnai/ mhol/ nai/
